
# Getting and cleaning data course project

This project is part of getting and cleaning data Course on coursera.The goal is to prepare tidy data set that can be used for later analysis.

Procesures followed in this project are as follows


1.Data set is downloaded and then unziped.The data used can be found on this link https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip
 
2.Then the training and test data sent are merged to create one data set. 
 
3.Only the measurements on the mean and standard deviation for each measurement are extracted 

4.Descriptive activity names are used to name the activities in the data set and labels the data set with descriptive variable names.

5.Finally an independent tidy data set with the average of each variable for each activity and each subject is created.
